metadata.title: CVE-2021-40904 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.description: The web management console of CheckMK Raw Edition (versions 1.5.0 to 1.6.0)allows a misconfiguration of the web-app Dokuwiki (installed by default),which allows embedded php code. As a result, remote code execution isachieved. Successful exploitation requires access to the web managementinterface, either with valid credentials or with a hijacked session by auser with the role of administrator.

criterions.comment: check-mk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
